messages.message:
I’m testing out our APIs and referring to this doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jcaAPmC7azkUWZeY0P4rRYPi2186s8Umf41JC4V8Hwo/edit) and I have a few questions.
• I can’t get the create conversation endpoint to work in postman, it doesn’t seem like I can get the file to be posted correctly. Has anyone got this working before?
• In the document, the ‘get conversation status’ endpoint should return a list of the documents in the conversation, i’m getting a blank list when I get the status of a conversation.   
Is there someone that could help here?

@avi
This is my conversations and the response from the API. The file list is empty.
@Vasu can you help Lee to setup Converse APIs

Hey @Lee, attaching an export of the collection I use in postman. This should help you upload files to the API in the expected way.

The files need to be added as form-data for this endpoint. The steps to do it in postman:
1. Click on the `body`  tab below the URL bar.
2. Navigate to the `form-data` section.
3. Under `key` column select `file` instead of `text` and add the name of the document under key. Select the document from your local under the value section.
That'd upload the documents as expected.
Thank you! I’ll give that a try now
